summary: Diff updates AddMoneyPage.tsx with new UI elements (instructions card, copy-to-clipboard/toasts, styling). However, the required static icon image assets are not added in the diff, and some requested instruction content/icons cannot be fully verified due to truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required payment method icon assets under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames bkash-icon.dim_128x128.png and nagad-icon.dim_128x128.png, and render them on the Add Money page via static asset paths (no backend routing).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows 'Added: 0' with no new files, and there is no evidence of the required icon files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Copy-to-clipboard for payment numbers with success toast notifications and a temporary 'copied' state.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requires numbers to be visible and easy to copy/read, but does not request implementing clipboard copy buttons/toast notifications/state management.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/AddMoneyPage.tsx (handleCopyNumber uses navigator.clipboard.writeText, toast.success, copiedNumber state)

hallucinated_features.description: Client-side Toaster integration on the Add Money page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request adding toast infrastructure/UI feedback components; it only specifies layout/content/icon requirements and not notification UI.
